Crimes.Legal_Issue: Nexus between fear of persecution and Convention ground
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Fear deemed speculative due to lack of evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial and documentary evidence regarding construction dispute
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution as a contractor in Russia
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of nexus to a Convention ground
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged error in RPD’s reasoning on nexus and risk assessment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Persecution linked to a Convention ground
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Existence of nexus and sufficiency of risk
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: No established link to protected ground and speculative risk
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence to establish objective basis for fear
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Fear not corroborated by credible evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's interpretation of nexus requirement
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of proof and burden on applicant
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not applicable – claim failed on merits

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Link between fear and Convention ground
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Risk based on individual actions, not group affiliation
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to prove risk on balance of probabilities
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Fear rooted in personal dispute, not systemic persecution
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Persecution must relate to a protected ground
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Allegation of error in RPD’s legal interpretation
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear arising from construction dispute in Russia
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Nature of conflict as private commercial dispute
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: RPD failed to properly assess nexus
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Narrative and contextual evidence about dispute
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Leave for judicial review and remittal
Crimes.Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review under Rule 324 of Federal Courts Rules

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Nexus between fear and Convention ground
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Affidavits and supporting documents related to construction project
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Profession as building contractor leading to persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Absence of connection to protected social group
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Requirement of persecution tied to Convention grounds
Crimes.Application_Factor: Private business conflict mistaken for political opinion or social group
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in assessing risk and group membership
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Fear stems from individual conduct, not protected characteristic
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroboration for alleged threats
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Misrepresentation in application regarding basis of fear
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistencies in narrative linking profession to persecution
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that RPD applied too narrow a view of social group
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review and deference to administrative tribunal
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to demonstrate particular social group
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not applicable – refusal on protection eligibility
